classDescription.summary: PackageInfo represents a real package in the Flash environment.

description.text:
Constructs a new PackageInfo instance.

Note that you do not have to pass-in the concrete package. But if you do not pass it in some methods cannot do their job correctly.

If you do not pass-in the name or the parent they are resolved lazily when requested using the passed-in package.

param.name: package
param.description: the actual package this instance represents

param.name: name
param.description: (optional) the name of the package

param.name: parent
param.description: (optional) the parent package

description.text: The algorithm to find packages.
The algorithm to find members of packages, that are classes and packages.
Stores the root package of the package hierarchy.
The fully qualified name of this package.
The members of this package.
The name of this package.
The actual package this instance represents.
The parent of this package.

Returns the package info corresponding to the passed-in packageName.

The passed-in packageName must be composed of the preceding path and the actual package name, that means it must be fully qualified. For example "org.as2lib.core".

This method first checks whether the package is already contained in the cache.

param.name: packageName
param.description: the fully qualified name of the package to find

field.title: Returns
field.description: the package info corresponding to the passed-in packageName

field.title: Throws
field.description:
IllegalArgumentException if the passed-in packageName is null, undefined or an empty string or if the object corresponding to the passed-in packageName is not of type "object"
PackageNotFoundException if a package with the passed-in packageName could not be found

description.text:
Returns the package info corresponding to the passed-in package.

This method first checks whether the package info is already contained in the cache.

param.name: package
param.description: the package you wanna get the package info for

field.title: Returns
field.description: the package info corresponding to the passed-in package

field.title: Throws
field.description: IllegalArgumentException if the passed-in package is null or undefined

description.text:
Returns the algorithm used to find packages.

Either the algorithm set via setPackageAlgorithm method will be returned or the default one which is an instance of class org.as2lib.env.reflect.algorithm.PackageAlgorithm.

field.title: Returns
field.description: the set or the default package algorithm

field.title: See also
field.description: setPackageAlgorithm

description.text:
Returns the member algorithm used to find members of packages.

Either the algorithm set via setPackageMemberAlgorithm will be returned or the default one which is an instance of class org.as2lib.env.reflect.algorithm.PackageMemberAlgorithm.

field.title: Returns
field.description: the set or the default member algorithm

field.title: See also
field.description: setPackageMemberAlgorithm

description.text:
Returns the root package of the package hierarchy.

If you do not set a custom root package via the #setRootPackage method, the default root package is returned that refers to _global.

field.title: Returns
field.description: the root package of the package hierarchy.

field.title: See also
field.description: setRootPackage

description.text:
Sets the algorithm used to find packages.

If newPackageAlgorithm is null or undefined, getPackageAlgorithm will return the default package algorithm.

param.name: newPackageAlgorithm
param.description: the new algorithm to find packages

field.title: See also
field.description: getPackageAlgorithm

description.text:
Sets the algorithm used to find members of packages.

Members of packages are classes, interfaces and packages.

If newPackageMemberAlgorithm is null or undefined, getPackageMemberAlgorithm will return the default package member algorithm.

param.name: newPackageMemberAlgorithm
param.description: the new algorithm to find members of packages

field.title: See also
field.description: getPackageMemberAlgorithm

description.text:
Sets the new root package of the package hierarchy.

If the passed-in newRootPackage argument is null or undefined the #getRootPackage method will return the default root package.

param.name: newRootPackage
param.description: the new root package of the package hierarchy

field.title: See also
field.description: getRootPackage

description.text:
Returns the fully qualified name of the represented package. This means the name of the package plus its package path/namespace.

The path is not included if:

  • The getParent method returns null or undefined.
  • The getParent method returns the root package, that means its isRoot method returns true.

field.title: Returns
field.description: the fully qualified name of the package

field.title: Specified by
field.description: PackageMemberInfo.getFullName

field.title: Overloading
field.description:
getMemberByName (memberName:String) : {VISDOC_LINK_1}
getMemberByMember (concreteMember) : {VISDOC_LINK_1}

description.text:
Returns the package member info corresponding to the passed-in concreteMember.

If the package member corresponding to the passed-in concreteMember cannot be found directly in the represented package its sub-packages are searched through.

null will be returned if:

  • The getMembers method returns null or undefined.
  • The passed-in concreteMember is null or undefined.
  • The member could not be found.

param.name: concreteMember
param.description: the concrete member to find

field.title: Returns
field.description: the package member info instance corresponding to the concreteMember

description.text:
Returns the package member info corresponding to the passed-in memberName.

If the package member with the passed-in memberName cannot be found directly in the represented package its sub-packages are searched through.

null will be returned if:

  • The getMembers method returns null or undefined.
  • The passed-in memberName is null or undefined.
  • There is no member with the passed-in memberName.

param.name: memberName
param.description: the name of the member to return

field.title: Returns
field.description: the member corresponding to the passed-in memberName

field.title: Overloading
field.description:
getMemberClassByName (className:String) : {VISDOC_LINK_0}
getMemberClassByClass (concreteClass:Function) : {VISDOC_LINK_0}

description.text:
Returns the class info corresponding to the passed-in concreteClass.

If the member class corresponding to the passed-in concreteClass cannot be found directly in the represented package its sub-packages are searched through.

null will be returned if:

  • The passed-in concreteClass is null or undefined.
  • There is no class matching the passed-in concreteClass in this package or any sub-packages.

param.name: concreteClass
param.description: the concrete class a corresponding class info shall be returned

field.title: Returns
field.description: the class info corresponding to the passed-in concreteClass

description.text:
Returns the class info corresponding to the passed-in className.

If the member class with the passed-in className cannot be found directly in the represented package its sub-packages are searched through.

null will be returned if:

  • The passed-in className is null or undefined.
  • There is no class with the passed-in className.

param.name: className
param.description: the name of the class

field.title: Returns
field.description: the class info corresponding to the passed-in className

field.title: Overloading
field.description:
getMemberClassesByFlag (filterSubPackages:Boolean) : Array
getMemberClassesByFilter (classFilter:{VISDOC_LINK_5}) : Array

description.text:
Returns an array containing ClassInfo instances representing the class members of the package and sub-packages that are not filtered/excluded.

The PackageMemberFilter.filter method of the passed-in classFilter is invoked for every member class to determine whether it shall be contained in the result.

If the passed-in clasFilter is null or undefined the result of an invocation of getMemberClassesByFlag with argument true will be returned.

null will be returned if:

  • The getPackage method returns null or undefined.
  • The execute method of the algorithm returned by getPackageMemberAlgorithm returns null or undefined.

param.name: classFilter
param.description: the filter that filters unwanted member classes out

field.title: Returns
field.description: an array containing the remaining member classes of the represented package

description.text:
Returns an array containing ClassInfo instances representing the member classes of the package and maybe the ones of the sub-packages.

If filterSubPackages is null or undefined it is interpreted as true, this means that sub-packages' classes are filtered by default.

null will be returned if:

  • The getPackage method returns null or undefined.
  • The execute method of the algorithm returned by getPackageMemberAlgorithm returns null or undefined.

param.name: filterSubPackages
param.description: (optional) determines whether to filter/exclude the sub-packages' member classes

field.title: Returns
field.description: an array containing the member classes of the represented package

field.title: Overloading
field.description:
getMemberPackageByName (packageName:String) : {VISDOC_LINK_1}
getMemberPackageByPackage (concretePackage) : {VISDOC_LINK_1}

description.text:
Returns the package info corresponding to the passed-in packageName.

If the member package with the passed-in packageName cannot be found directly in the represented package its sub-packages are searched through.

null will be returned if:

  • The passed-in packageName is null or undefined.
  • The getMemberPackages method returns null.
  • There is no package with the given packageName.

param.name: packageName
param.description: the name of the package

field.title: Returns
field.description: the package info corresponding to the passed-in packageName

description.text:
Returns the package info corresponding to the passed-in concretePackage.

If the member package corresponding to the passed-in concretePackage cannot be found directly in the represented package its sub-packages are searched through.

null will be returned if:

  • The passed-in concretePackage is null or undefined.
  • The getMemberPackages method returns null.
  • A package matching the passed-in concretePackage could not be found.

param.name: concretePackage
param.description: the concrete package the corresponding package info shall be returned for

field.title: Returns
field.description: the package info corresponding to the passed-in concretePackage

field.title: Overloading
field.description:
getMemberPackagesByFlag (filterSubPackages:Boolean) : Array
getMemberPackagesByFilter (packageFilter:{VISDOC_LINK_5}) : Array

description.text:
Returns an array containing instances representing the package members of the package and sub-packages that are not filtered/excluded.

The PackageMemberFilter.filter method of the passed-in packageFilter is invoked for every member package to determine whether it shall be contained in the result.

If the passed-in packageFilter is null or undefined the result of the invocation of getMemberPackagesByFlag with argument true will be returned.

null will be returned if:

  • The getPackage method returns null or undefined.
  • The execute method of the algorithm returned by getPackageMemberAlgorithm returns null or undefined.

param.name: packageFilter
param.description: the filter that filters unwanted member packages out

field.title: Returns
field.description: an array containing the remaining member packages of the represented package

description.text:
Returns an array containing instances representing the member packages of the package and maybe the ones of the sub-packages.

If filterSubPackages is null or undefined it is interpreted as true, this means sub-packages' packages are filtered by default.

null will be returned if:

  • The getPackage method returns null or undefined.
  • The execute method of the algorithm returned by getPackageMemberAlgorithm returns null or undefined.

param.name: filterSubPackages
param.description: (optional) determines whether the sub-packages' member packages shall be filtered/excluded from or included in the result

field.title: Returns
field.description: an array containing the member packages of the represented package

field.title: Overloading
field.description:
getMembersByFlag (filterSubPackages:Boolean) : Array
getMembersByFilter (packageMemberFilter:{VISDOC_LINK_5}) : Array

description.text:
Returns an array containing PackageMemberInfo instances representing the members of the package and sub-packages that are not filtered/excluded.

The members of this package are all types and packages contained in the represented package.

The PackageMemberFilter.filter method of the passed-in packageMemberFilter is invoked for every package member to determine whether it shall be contained in the result.

If the passed-in packageMemberFilter is null or undefined the result of the invocation of getMembersByFlag with argument true will be returned.

null will be returned if:

  • The getPackage method returns null or undefined.
  • The execute method of the algorithm returned by getPackageMemberAlgorithm returns null or undefined.

param.name: packageMemberFilter
param.description: the filter that filters unwanted package members out

field.title: Returns
field.description: an array containing the remaining members of the represented package

description.text:
Returns an array containing PackageMemberInfo instances representing the members of the package and maybe the ones of the sub-packages.

The members of the package are all types and packages contained in the represented package.

If filterSubPackages is null or undefined it is interpreted as true, that means sub-packages' package members will be filtered/excluded from the result by default.

null will be returned if

  • The getPackage method returns null or undefined.
  • The execute method of the algorithm returned by getPackageMemberAlgorithm returns null or undefined.

param.name: filterSubPackages
param.description: (optional) determines whether to filter the sub-packages' members

field.title: Returns
field.description: an array containing the members of the represented package

description.text:
Returns the name of the represented package.

This does not include the package's path/namespace. If this package info represented for example the org.as2lib.core package the returned name would be "core".

field.title: Returns
field.description: the name of the represented package

field.title: See also
field.description: getFullName

field.title: Specified by
field.description: MemberInfo.getName

description.text: Returns the actual package this instance represents.

field.title: Returns
field.description: the actual package

description.text:
Returns the parent of the represented package.

The parent is the package the represented package is contained in / a member of. The parent of the package org.as2lib.core is org.as2lib.

field.title: Returns
field.description: the parent of the represented package

description.text:
Initializes the name and the parent of the represented package.

This is done using the result of an execution of the package algorithm returned by the static getPackageAlgorithm method.

Returns true if this package is the parent package of the passed-in package.

false will be returned if:

  • The passed-in package is not a parent package of this package.
  • The passed-in package is null or undefined.
  • The passed-in package equals this package.
  • The passed-in package's isRoot method returns true.

param.name: package
param.description: package this package may be a parent of

field.title: Returns
field.description: true if this package is the parent of the passed-in package

description.text:
Returns whether this package is a root package.

It is supposed to be a root package when its parent is null.

field.title: Returns
field.description: true if this package info represents a root package else false

description.text:
Returns the string representation of this instance.

The string representation is constructed as follows:

[reflection fullyQualifiedNameOfReflectedPackage]

field.title: Returns
field.description: this instance's string representation

field.title: Overrides
field.description: org.as2lib.core.BasicClass.toString

field.title: Specified by
field.description: org.as2lib.core.BasicInterface.toString
